name: Exodus: Proxima Centauri
description: Adapted from the original board game, Exodus: Proxima Centauri pits you against up to 5 opponents where you'll fulfill the role of explorer, colonizer, politician, and military commander. Make the best tactical decisions as there can be only 1 winner and leader of humankind!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 1024 resolution Storage: 650 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 1024 resolution Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 650 MB available space
